title: TGaceAllStories
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘He never asks for anything’: I’m 61 with a $1.5 million 401(k). My girlfriend says I do too much for my son, 28. Is she right?
items.description: “I recently gave him $20,000 for a newer car and had him finance the rest.”

items.title: My husband and I are splitting our estate between his child and my three children. Should they get equal shares?
items.description: “We try to help all our kids when we can, yet push for self-sufficiency.”

items.title: ‘I’m not looking to leave any money to the kids’: We’re in our 60s with $1.5 million in IRAs. Can we retire next year?
‘I don’t know how much my wife earns’: I’m 63 with $6.4 million in stocks, mostly Apple. Will I get punished on taxes?
items.description: “Each of our properties are worth over $1 million.”

items.title: ‘It’s heartbreaking’: My cousin died and her estranged husband has taken possession of her home. Can we evict him?
items.description: “The house remains in her name. He has since kicked out each of the boys one by one.”

items.title: Three top Wall Street analysts stay bullish on Nvidia stock. Here's why

items.title: Activist Ananym Capital urges LKQ to sell its European auto parts business
items.description: Divesting its European business means LKQ will be able to focus all its attention on its higher margin North American operations.
